Cleaning Bench Surfaces
=======================

Purpose
-------

Routine cleaning protocol for lab benches.

Materials
---------

- 70% ethanol spray
- Kimwipes or paper towels

Protocol
--------

1. Clear the bench of unnecessary items.
2. Spray 70% ethanol to lightly wet the surface.
3. Wipe from clean to dirty areas.
4. Allow the surface to air-dry.
